DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate safety effectiveness erbium laser dermatological cosmetic procedure .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose investigation evaluate erbium laser device dermatological cosmetic procedure . Each subject undergo 6 treatment session , schedule time-points follow-up visit . The Investigator determines number treatment . Subjects may treat face , neck , chest body area deem appropriate Investigator . At visit , treat area clinically evaluate side effect also photograph take treated area . Subjects ask complete self-assessment questionnaire different time point throughout study participation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Adults ( 18 year old ) . Subjects read , understand , sign Informed Consent Form . Subjects willing able comply study requirement . Subjects active localized systemic infection . Immunocompromised subject . Subjects coagulation disorder . History skin photo sensitivity disorder , use photosensitizing drug ( e.g. , tetracycline sulfa drug ) . Pregnant and/or lactating ( All female volunteer advise use birth control period study ) . In opinion trained clinician , subject unwilling unable adhere study requirement , include application followup visit . Use AccutaneÂ® within past 6 month . Subjects history radiation therapy treatment area . Subjects skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation use typical ancillary medical treatment care use , treatment . Subjects undergone dermatological procedure ( e.g. , laser light treatment ) treatment wrinkle , skin resurfacing , skin rejuvenation treatment area within 1 year study participation .
